title: Scams going around

embed.description: I love when it is censored and mods delete it, but the fools that fell for it are still like "I know it's real anyway!". Just because it looks just like a Riot page doesn't make it real.

body:
Guys a lot of the younger players are falling for this and I just wanted to warn you as most people dont look at the details etc, this post explains everything so read up and happy holidays!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
